title: Can I ask help from an essay writing service? - Quora

response.answer_text: Somehow, “help” in relation to essay writing has become synonymous with custom writing. If you mean that - yes, you can ask them for “help” and they will write your essay for you. However, if you have ordered a paper and want help with clarifying some choices, understanding the text, etc. - no, you can’t. Writers are paid for the writte papers, not to provide explanations to the clients. I work as a tutor and I am ready to assist students on any stage of assay writing starting from helping to understand the instructions and finishing with editing and proofreading of the paper. If you think you might finish the work on your own, but you need a push, a clarification, an explanation, or any other help, feel free to contact me here.

Can you get some ‘service’ to write your paper? Sure! You can probably also pay someone to take your exams too! Or, instead of committing academic fraud, you could do your own work. You’ll get more out of it and won’t get kicked out of school. Oh and you will, eventually, get caught if you cheat, so don’t.

If you employ someone else to write your essay then you are cheating. Your cheating your teachers and cheating yourself. The purpose of writing the essay is so that you comprehend the question, do the relevant research and then synthesise that so you can succinctly answer the question
